any way….

about suitescript can’t also read the Item Number Field,

this’s a relate case.

eg: 生产日期 custitemnumber_manufactureddate Date Y
2 保质期（年） custitemnumber_datetime Decimal Number

one lot item has many lot. (eg:10), so this item has 10 line custitemnumber_manufactureddate

I need this should be read in my script. how to read the Item Number Field???

解决方案 寻求中。。
